name: Imu
text:
Under the rules of this game, you cannot include Events with a cost of 2 or more in your deck. Also, at the start of the game, play up to 1 {Mary Geoise} type Stage from your deck.
Activate:Main Once Per Turn You may trash 1 {Celestial Dragons} type Character from your field or 1 card from your hand: Draw 1 card.

effect.text: You may trash 1 {Celestial Dragons} type Character from your field or 1 card from your hand: Draw 1 card.
